pullrequest.title: Model submission for X4 sensor config 2

content.raw:
Try using my Bitbucket username: “acschang”

Yeah, I think using some Tera\* sensor is fine.  I figured they had a bit bigger field of view than just 2 points.  I’d like to see that expanded to be accurate if possible.  It makes perfect sense to use a sensor with a FoV for the up/down scan.

Oh, the things we do for RViz.  I think the proper way to do this is just to go with a non-planar view down with some very limited FoV.  Essentially following the rough specs provided by whichever Tera\* sensor you decide on.  If you need some help on getting it to work, ping me back.
content.html:
Try using my Bitbucket username: “acschang”

Yeah, I think using some Tera* sensor is fine. I figured they had a bit bigger field of view than just 2 points. I’d like to see that expanded to be accurate if possible. It makes perfect sense to use a sensor with a FoV for the up/down scan.

Oh, the things we do for RViz. I think the proper way to do this is just to go with a non-planar view down with some very limited FoV. Essentially following the rough specs provided by whichever Tera* sensor you decide on. If you need some help on getting it to work, ping me back.
